title: need tips getting to salty :S
body:
Hi,

i need some tips i am getting to salty if i lose alote. I mean to day  i had 2 trolls b2b in my games after the second one i am getting salty :S.
i lost 6 games in a row to day it is ok to lose 1-3 games but after it hits 4 i become toxic help me :S.

replies.body:
If you don't want to get salty and toxic, just pretend every loss is your fault, whether it actually is or not. And then see what you can do better individually next game, compared to your last one. Its hard to do, but it works.

Source: Been there b4.
ok i will try this one stil losing tho 9 games now LOL :D riot please
that mindset is way to hard to fall into.  Because realistically its 'your team's' fault... including you, but not only you.

Yeah, like I said its not easy, but it works. I played with that mindset after 2 years of being mediocre and finally got where I wanted to be on the ladder. Of course there are other ways, but this is what I used.
I am literally unable to ignore that my allies make mistakes.

Then don't. But at least look at your own a lot more. Its easy to find faults in other peoples gameplay, but hardest to find it in your own. And at the end of the day, you are going to go through thousands of different teams, but the only player who will be the same in all those games is yourself. So you might as well focus on self-improvement.
it is just frustrating to watch, and makes playing the game even harder.  by the end of the game even if i can identify the mistakes i made, i'm to upset to focus.

I know it sounds silly, but play to learn, not to win.  If your goal is to win every game, and that is what determines your fun level, you will not have fun roughly 50% of the time.  If you play to learn, you never lose.

As far as dealing with nasty trolls, you can always try a build from http://www.ultimate-bravery.com/ to get some revenge ;-)
I dont see the difference in either of these.

1. if you lose, its mainly your fault ( even if you are 10:0 )

2. if you lose 3 games in a row, stop playing for that day. period.
